Dimension.description: The dimension this balloon appears in.

UpSpeed.description: How far you'll go upwards after popping the balloon.

MinSpeed.description: The minimum amount of speed you'll get from popping the balloon.

MaxSpeed.description: The maximum amount of speed you can get from popping the balloon.

ResetTime.description: How long it takes the balloon to re-spawn after it's been popped.

DoesInstantAppear.description: Whether the balloon instantly re-appears when re-spawning, or floats in from the top of the screen.

IsGroupSet.description: Whether this object is part of a group?
